clinical_study.brief_title: Oral Acetyl-L-Carnitine Therapy Reduces Fatigue In Hepatic Encephalopathy
clinical_study.official_title: ORAL ACETYL-L-CARNITINE THERAPY REDUCES FATIGUE IN HEPATIC ENCEPHALOPATHY

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study was to evaluate the effect of exogenous ALC on the both physical and mental fatigue in mild and moderate encephalopatic patients.

intervention.description: 2 g acetylcarnitine taken orally twice a day.
